meanings.sent1: The celebrator danced joyfully at the party.
meanings.sent2: The birthday celebrator blew out the candles on the cake.
meanings.sent3: The celebrator wore a funny hat to the event.
meanings.sent4: She was a true celebrator of life, finding joy in every moment.
meanings.sent5: The celebrator's laughter filled the room with happiness.

meanings.definition: One who takes part in festivities or ceremonies.
meanings.sent1: As a celebrator, he enjoyed the music and food at the festival.
meanings.sent2: The wedding celebrator tossed confetti in the air.
meanings.sent3: The celebrator accidentally tripped during the parade.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated celebrator of traditions, always participating with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The celebrator's presence added to the festive atmosphere of the gathering.
